code: import React from'react';import Card from'react-bootstrap/Card';import Container from'react-bootstrap/Container';import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row';import Col from'react-bootstrap/Col';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Certificates(){const certificates=[{title:"CISCO CCNAv7",subtitle:"Introduction to Networks",description:"Learn the basics of networking including OSI model, TCP/IP, subnetting, and more."},{title:"CISCO IoT",subtitle:"Introduction to IoT",description:"Explore the fundamentals of the Internet of Things including IoT devices, protocols, and applications."},{title:"CISCO CyberSecurity",subtitle:"Introduction to Cybersecurity",description:"Understand key cybersecurity concepts such as threats, vulnerabilities, cryptography, and network security."},{title:"HackersGen",subtitle:"Complete Linux/Ubuntu course",description:"Master Linux/Ubuntu operating system, command line, file system, and shell scripting."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{id:"certifications",className:"px-2 my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"px-0 mx-2 display-6 fw-bolder underline w-max mb-4",children:"My certifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"px-0 mx-2 mb-4 lead",children:"Over the years, I have taken several exams aimed at earning useful certifications in different fields and you can find some of them below!"}),certificates.map(certificate=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:3,md:6,className:"mb-3 px-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{height:"100%"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-dark text-light py-2 px-3 fw-bold",children:certificate.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:certificate.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:certificate.description})]})]})},certificate.id))]})});}export default Certificates;
